resources.string:
Sayali Kulkarni is an ambitious, beautiful & dynamic girl from the city of Pune, Maharashtra. ​ 

The app mainly targets on studying & explaining Sayali's qualities which inspires others to follow the well known phenomenon of learning, growing & repeating. ​ 

This document consists the functional flow of some of the core and important features of the Sayali Kulkarni.​

Frontend - Beauty, Cuteness & Sound Communication​ 

Backend - Caring, Thoughtful, Hard Working & Futuristic vision​ 

API calls - Alertness & Detail Oriented Approach​ 

Payment Gateway - Eeshana Solutions/ Rahul Kalavar, Mrs. Kulkarni (Sayali's mom)​ 

Social Network APIs - Baby Addya Pimpale, Mr. & Mrs. Pimpale, Prachi Mohite-Salunkhe, Rahul Kalavar, S. R., Poonam Pakhale, Shital Pimple, Damini Vashistha etc.​
S is related to her features & functions related to Smartness, Superb Understanding of Future and Subtle Taste of Food & Clothing
A is related to her features & functions related to Awareness of things, solution oriented Attitude toward the problems and Aesthetically gifted looks​
Y is related to her features & functions related to Youthful excitement & Yogic focus while working (as well as towards her favorite music & watching GOT) ​
A is related to her features & functions related to her Accountability towards everything she take in her hands, Alert Actions & Adorable presence ​
L is related to her features & functions related to Lovable personality, Loyalty in friendship & Lengths of never ending talks ​
I is related to her features & functions related to her Intelligence, Intellectual abilities & her Ideals towards life​
